messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Back to school?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/20/01 2:39:45 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Kris can you adopt me please.... I m still sitting in over 100 degree weather with the air
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/20/01 2:39:45 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Fall and winter mean time in front of the fire, rambling chats, arts &
> crafts, baking, family meals and every other aspect of our unschooled
> lifestyle. I thank God for these coming months of intense kid time.
>
> Kris
>

Kris can you adopt me please.... I'm still sitting in over 100 degree weather
with the air conditioning full blast and I'd love to be somewhere cold and
snuggled up to a roaring fire. It sounds like a dream to me.... Thank
goodness we are heading for Oregon next year.

Dawn
^^^^^^^^^^^^
Dawn Falbe

Enlightening women on how to live their Soul Purpose

"The people who get on in this world
are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and,
if they can't find them, make them." - George Bernard Shaw

"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school."-George
Bernard Shaw
